reg:regulation.reg:acttitle: Greater Vancouver Sewerage and Drainage District Act
reg:regulation.reg:title: Ashcroft Ranch Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 6 (1a) and 7 (2a) of the Greater Vancouver Sewerage and Drainage District Act, Ashcroft Ranch means

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the parcels of land described in Schedule 1,
the water licences, appurtenant to those parcels, that are
including any licence issued in amendment of, or in full or partial substitution for, those licences, and
Grazing Licence RAN073068 dated for reference April 1, 1996.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Greater Vancouver Sewerage and Drainage District Act, S.B.C. 1956, c. 59, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 6 (1b)]
